content: Setting aside the fact that the hypocracy is thicker than a concrete wall all that will ultimately come of this is further polarization of the country. content: Setting aside the fact that the hypocracy is thicker than a concrete wall all that will ultimately come of this is further polarization of the country. For the thin skinned nancy boys whose basic problem is that we didn't immediately surrender when attacked such drum head trials may be a good thing, but for rational people it is a course of action that can only lead to an ultimately bad end. The precedent is horrifying; every change in administration will now result in witch hunt of the previous one based on some newly expedient interpretation of past events. It will polarize the parties and it will definitely polarize the populace. I have little doubt that the farce will continue until 2010 and then with an inevitable shift in the political structure they will end and the whole BS thing will start all over again, only with the Dems in the hot seat. Once it starts gridlock will seem like the good old days.
